titles.title: Safe Leave for Victims of Domestic Violence, Sexual Assault, and Stalking Act
Safe Leave for Victims of Domestic Violence, Sexual Assault, and Stalking Act

To amend the Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 to permit leave for an employee to meet their needs related to being a victim of dating violence, domestic violence, sexual assault, sex trafficking, or stalking, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Accountability, and House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
